fileheader.reference: Ref 1: /Aircraft/UIUC/asw20-v1-nl/README.asw20.html /Aircraft/UIUC/asw20-v1-nl/aircraft.dat /Aircraft/UIUC/asw20-v1-nl/CDfa-01.dat /Aircraft/UIUC/asw20-v1-nl/CLfa-01.dat /Aircraft/UIUC/asw20-v1-nl/Cmfa-01.dat Ref 2: Flight and Operations Manual for Sailplane Model ASW 20; July, 1977 Edition (http://ebookbrowse.com/asw20-flight-manual-pdf-d182065150) Ref 3: Luftfahrt-Bundesamt Geraetekennblatt Nr. 314; Ausgabe Nr.13; 20.02.1997 Ref 4: Johnson, R.H., "A Flight Test Evaluation of the ASW 20," Soaring Magazine, May 1978 Ref 5: http://www.alexander-schleicher.de/service/polaren/polare20A.jpg Ref 6: http://www.alpenstreckenflug.de/Prospekte/Alexander%20Schleicher/ASW%2020/page_01.htm Ref 7: Jones, Nathan H, "Glider Ground Effect Investigation" Thesis, Department of The Air Force Air University, Wright-Patterson Air force Base Ohio, USA, 1989, Storming Media, Washington DC 20002
